title: Fliplet Primary Button schema
description: The root schema for the Fliplet Primary Button.

uuid.description: Unique GUID for the component instance. This can be used to target the component instance in css files.
uuid.title: Unique GUID for the component instance

label.description: The label to display in the button
label.title: Title of the button

action.title: Action when the button is pressed

page.description: The ID of the target screen. This can be found on Fliplet Studio for each screen of the app.
page.title: The ID of the target screen

action.description: The action that should run when the button is pressed.
action.title: Action to run when the button is pressed

transition.description: The type of transition to run when navigating to a different screen.
transition.title: The transition for the navigate action

package.description: The package name of the component to use. This is automatically set by the system and should not be changed.
package.title: The package name of the component

version.description: The version of the component to use. This is automatically set by the system and should not be changed.
version.title: The version of the component to use
